description:
encoding/json: call (*T).MarshalJSON for addressable T values.

Fixes issue 2170.

messages.text:
On Thu, Feb 2, 2012 at 1:36 PM,  <cw@f00f.org> wrote:

> What about Unmarshal?

It works already. I've added a test case for it.

http://codereview.appspot.com/5618045/diff/1003/src/pkg/encoding/json/encode_test.go
File src/pkg/encoding/json/encode_test.go (right):

http://codereview.appspot.com/5618045/diff/1003/src/pkg/encoding/json/encode_test.go#newcode130
src/pkg/encoding/json/encode_test.go:130: // Ref has Marshaler methods with pointer receiver.
On 2012/02/02 03:07:16, adg wrote:
> and Unmarshaler

Done.

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=99fcde03be70 ***

encoding/json: call (*T).MarshalJSON for addressable T values.

Fixes issue 2170.

R=golang-dev, cw, adg
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5618045

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

What about Unmarshal?

I had a stab at this over at

  http://codereview.appspot.com/4247057/

Which wasn't right and has since bit-rotted.

LGTM
